ModMetaData.name: Ryuu's Electric Stonecutter's Table
ModMetaData.author: Ryuu
ModMetaData.description:
This mod only contains an electric stonecutter's table. The efficiency of an electric stonecutter's table is 200% that of a stonecutter's table. But like the electric production buildings in RimWorld, construction requires components and can breakdown.
Please feel free to speak up if you have any suggestions or comments.
Compatibility: Compatible with Stonecutting Extended (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2571676542)
source project link: https://github.com/Ryuu-64/Ryuu-RimWorld-ElectricStonecuttersTable
Contributors: scott2521(76561198073525178): Provides compatibility methods with other mods.
